metadata.title: CVE-2019-7314 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: liblivemedia in Live555 before 2019.02.03 mishandles the termination of anRTSP stream after RTP/RTCP-over-RTSP has been set up, which could lead to aUse-After-Free error that causes the RTSP server to crash (Segmentationfault) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: liblivemedia: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
